Posts.EditableText: I don't need one of those.  That sort of thing came on a CD that I got with a VB Beginners book when I started learning.  Anybody can do that.  We certainly don't need half a dozen posts in 1 1/2 hours on updates.  As ITID said, just edit your original post.  I'm not even gonna waste my bandwidth on such a program when I've already got it!
